content: k1* ​ round 8 *k2tog* ​ charted pattern each round read right to left finishing cut yarn leaving a 10-12 tail with your darning needle weave tail through remaining 16 20 sts pull tight and secure weave in all ends block according to your yarn s washing instructions to achieve desired fit misc every effort has been made to ensure accuracy in this pattern but if you have questions or comments please reach out to me @lochknits on ravelry or instagram i d love to hear from you happy knitting hayley
